name: FlipPix Art - Holidays
description:
New! FlipPix Art - Holidays is now designed for both the iPhone and the iPad!

An old Japanese logic puzzle takes on a new look with FlipPix Art! Touch tiles to paint them or break them to form colorful components of paintings. The goal is to use logic to determine which tiles should be filled to reveal a hidden picture.

FlipPix Art - Holidays has 6 holiday scenes containing 222 puzzles in a variety of sizes from 5x5 to 15x15 and range from very easy to challenging. Also known as nonograms or griddlers, FlipPix Art - Holidays puzzles are designed for both the iPhone and the iPad.

Also included is a 7th Bonus scene for loyal customers which contains an additional set of 39 puzzles.

A short tutorial on the basics of the game is included.
